text: Khudayberdino () is a rural locality (a village) in Yalchinsky Selsoviet, Kugarchinsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 378 as of 2010. There are 3 streets. == Geography == It is located 45 km from Mrakovo, 7 km from Yalchino. == References == Category:Rural localities in Kugarchinsky District
title: Khudayberdino
